text: kesētochi፣ kewenidochi lijochimi፣ kewerik’ina kebiri፣ ketekamechu genizebochimi፣ ketesemaru feresochimi፣ kegimeli kekebitina kefiyelimi፣ ke’āzimerami yeẖonu filagotochini mewidedi lesewochi tesheleme፡፡ yihi hulu yek’iribītu ḥiyiweti met’ek’emīya newi፡፡ ālahimi irisu zenidi melikami memelesha (geneti) āle፡፡
